column4: anyone knows a goot LaTeX program? I don't want Wysiwyg, I want classic typesetting
you mean an editor?
yes
I use emacs with acutex
for all reports at university
IMHO nothing is comparable to emacs with acutex
you meen auctex?
do I need tetex-base or something?
yes
I installed auctex, and tetex-base that's all then for emacs?
maybe tetex-extra too
how do i install packages like fancyheaders or similar?
fancyheaders is in tetex-extra, I think
ok, thanks
are you already familiar with emacs?
yes, a bit. why do you ask?
I was going to tell you it would take a little time to getting used to it
but it all worth it
I used emacs a lot before for c++, no latex so far though
you won't get into trouble then
i suppose not
it's rather latex giving me trouble then emacs! :)
